titleStmt.title: The blinde-mans sermon: or confutation of the blinde Pharises. By Thomas Granger, preacher of the word, at Botterwike nere Boston in Lincolnshire
titleStmt.author: Granger, Thomas, b. 1578.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Thomas Pauier, and are to be sold at his shop in Iuie-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
